ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.utils

Class TopBarHandlerFragments

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.utils.TopBarHandlerFragments

  • public class TopBarHandlerFragments
extends java.lang.Object
    Only contains static functions to control the top bar that is to be displayed in several activities.

    • Method Detail

      • setupTransparentTopBar

        public static void setupTransparentTopBar(androidx.fragment.app.Fragment fragment,
                                          int iconColorId)
        Sets up the top bar in it's transparent form. By coloring top bar transparent and setting all icons to a given color
        Parameters:
        fragment - active fragment.
        iconColorId - color to set icons to.

      • setupGreyTopBar

        public static void setupGreyTopBar(androidx.fragment.app.Fragment fragment)
        Sets up the top bar in it's grey form. By coloring top bar grey and setting all icons to DarkGreen
        Parameters:
        fragment - Active fragment.

      • setupSwitch

        public static void setupSwitch(androidx.fragment.app.Fragment fragment,
                               java.lang.String leftText,
                               java.lang.String rightText,
                               android.widget.CompoundButton.OnCheckedChangeListener listener)
        Setup the switch given two texts and a listener for switch event
        Parameters:
        fragment - currently using
        leftText - text that appears left of switch.
        rightText - text that appears right of switch.
        listener - listener to event when switch is pressed.

      • setupDots

        public static void setupDots(androidx.fragment.app.Fragment fragment,
                             android.view.View.OnClickListener listener)
        Setup the dots button given a listener that gets called when dots button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        fragment - currently using
        listener - to be called when dots button is clicked

      • setVisibilityTopBar

        public static void setVisibilityTopBar(androidx.fragment.app.Fragment fragment,
                                       boolean visible)
        Sets the visibility of the top bar
        Parameters:
        fragment - active fragment
        visible - If true visible else invisible
